subject: AI & Agents
title: CI/CD for Machine Learning
description: A micro-lesson that makes CI/CD for Machine Learning usable.

hook.text: In software, every PR triggers tests. In ML, every model change should too.

buildup.text: ML CI/CD automates testing, validation, and deployment of both code and models.

discovery.text: CI: lint code, run unit tests, validate data schema. CD: evaluate model, gate on metrics, deploy.

twist.text: ML tests include data tests (schema, drift), model tests (accuracy, bias), and infra tests.

climax.text: GitHub Actions or GitLab CI can run the full ML pipeline on every commit.

punchline.text: Ship models like software: tested, reviewed, automated.

quiz.question: What extra tests does ML CI/CD include beyond software tests?
options: Data validation, model accuracy, and bias checks
